attributes.action: charge non British citizens for using the National Health Service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more people are travelling to the UK to use our Health care free of charge. This is putting extreme pressure on our funding and resources. If they travel here they should have medical insurance to cover the costs of ANY treatment in the UK. 
Why should people living in the UK pay for their treatment. We have to pay in other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
